bit_field_value.name: PCR_ISF_NOT_DETECTED
bit_field_value.description: Configured interrupt is not detected.

bit_field_value.name: PCR_ISF_DETECTED
bit_field_value.description: Configured interrupt is detected. If the pin is configured to generate a DMA request, then the corresponding flag will be cleared automatically at the completion of the requested DMA transfer. Otherwise, the flag remains set until a logic 1 is written to the flag. If the pin is configured for a level sensitive interrupt and the pin remains asserted, then the flag is set again immediately after it is cleared.

bit_field_value.name: PCR_ISF_NOT_DETECTED
bit_field_value.description: Configured interrupt is not detected.

bit_field_value.name: PCR_ISF_DETECTED
bit_field_value.description: Configured interrupt is detected. If the pin is configured to generate a DMA request, then the corresponding flag will be cleared automatically at the completion of the requested DMA transfer. Otherwise, the flag remains set until a logic 1 is written to the flag. If the pin is configured for a level sensitive interrupt and the pin remains asserted, then the flag is set again immediately after it is cleared.
